recommendations: Christopher Spear
Vice President of Operations at Infusionsoft
June 4, 2016, Christopher managed Drena directly

I was privileged to have Drena on my team during her tenure at Infusionsoft. From day-one, she proved to be a powerful contributor and leader. Drena took on a major role in leading our employees and implementation partners in strategic CRM initiatives.  Throughout the process, she influenced and led process design and automation for major customer-facing processes for Direct Sales, Customer Support, Professional Services, and Partners. In the midst of leading big initiatives, Drena proved to be a great leader of not just her team, but she engaged in coaching and mentoring of many others.  She helped put together a meaningful retreat program for all VPs in the company and has been a great cross-functional collaborator too.  She planned and led monthly Review and Planning (RAP) Sessions with all business functions to help our Operations team stay in sync with our business counterparts throughout the company.  Drena is a great leader, thought-partner, and multiplier.
Christopher Spear
Vice President of Operations at Infusionsoft

Brett Gilliland
Vice President at Infusionsoft
May 26, 2016, Brett worked with Drena in different groups

Drena's influence and leadership was immediately felt when she joined our company.  Within her first month of working here, Drena was given ownership of a quarterly priority for the company, which is something that is usually reserved for leaders who have been here longer.  That priority involved a large CRM implementation, which she skillfully led.  She led the priority so well that she was asked to continue leading that work over the next few quarters.  Drena is one of those people who is both smart and collaborative (two qualities that aren't always found in the same person).  Any organization would be fortunate to have Drena contributing to its success.

Amanda Souders
VP, Customer Success at Infusionsoft
April 29, 2016, Amanda worked with Drena in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Drena for 18 months at Infusionsoft and am thrilled at the opportunity to recommend her. Drena is exceptional in many ways and is well-rounded in both experience and skill-set:ANALYTICSI've seen Drena take multiple data sets with very little context and figure out the root issue of complex business problems. Drena is brilliant (and not the least bit boastful about it.)  EXECUTION EXCELLENCEIn addition to having an extraordinary knack for analytics, Drena gets things DONE!  She effectively planned, coordinated cross-departmental and vendor resources, and facilitated a three-phase launch of Salesforce with ease.  When Drena is at the helm, everyone breathes a sigh a relief AND follows her head with urgency and enthusiasm.  PARTNERSHIP and WORKING RELATIONSHIPWhen we first began working together, Drena reached out and proactively fostered meaningful partnerships with stakeholders across the company, including myself. Throughout our time working together, Drena frequently checked in to keep lines of communication open. Drena also successfully helped maximize her team's potential and capacity through her strong leadership and care.It was a wonderful experience and an honor to have worked with Drena, and I would highly recommend her to any organization.
Amanda Souders

April 25, 2016, Cheyne reported directly to Drena

In my time working with Drena, she has been a great mentor who has helped me grow as a leader.  She has the ability to bring amazing perspective to any situation.  When she first came onboard at Infusionsoft, she made it very clear that she wanted to help me grow and consistently made an effort in helping me achieve my goals along the way.  Drena is a very detailed oriented person, and her project management skills are off the chart.  She has a growth mindset and would be a great asset to any team.  I am very fortunate to have a person like Drena in my corner and know she will continue to do amazing things throughout her career.

Advocate for Innovation that Positively Impacts People
April 24, 2016, Susan worked with Drena in different groups

Drena is an A player that brings strategic thinking and leadership to every company she joins. She was the ideal candidate to lead Infusionsoft's multi-million dollar Salesforce implementation. She works collaboratively across all levels of peers, executives and her direct reports. She was recognized as the top 1% leader and as a result attended the Champions Club retreat with Infusionsoft Executives and top customers. Drena is intellectually curious and one of the top problem solvers I've worked, thriving on complex business challenges. Her positive mindset and openness to learning and growing, make her one of the top talents in the Phoenix area!

VP of Sales at Booker Software
April 22, 2016, Drena worked with Christine in the same group

Drena is one of the most intelligent, multi-faceted professionals I know. She enjoys working in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment and can keep everyone engaged and executing throughout the process. She sees the challenges of a daunting goal and naturally begins gathering resources and creating action plans. I love problem solving with Drena.  She's able to challenge the established way of thinking and lead the team to a broader perspective that others miss at first glance.  Her humility and pleasant demeanor make others line up behind her to follow her lead.  Drena comes with my highest recommendation as any organization would benefit greatly from adding her to their executive leadership team.

Bill Hoffman
Listen, Learn and share your experiences every day.
April 19, 2016, Bill worked with Drena in different groups

I worked with Drena for the first time on a project to analyze how we can serve our customers better. She was brought on as an executive consultant by our Chief Customer Officer. At the time, in addition to delivering solutions to the project at hand, she had another challenge at hand: earning trust with the team and managing 16 or so people in the project, none of which worked for her. She was masterful! When you are with her you feel you are being listened to. Her sharp intellect and ability to process challenges and collaborate on solutions are some of the best I have seen in my career. A true leader, Drena takes data, people, process and technology and is able to deliver solutions to complex challenges. The best part about her leadership style is she always gives credit to her team. She is humble, kind and utterly professional. I enjoy working with Drena any time I can because I always learn something.
Bill Hoffman

Amanda is one of a kind! She embodies true leadership, professionalism and unmatched levels of care. Amanda brings so much to the table and any company is fortunate to have her as a leader and mentor!

Christine is one of the most capable leaders I have ever met. She is very strategically focused and at the same time shines on the execution end. Christine delivers - by innovating, thinking outside of the box and by "growing the pie." The most impressive part about Christine is her ability to lift, motivate and multiply each member of her team! I have observed Christine inspire and grow her team as well as members of her peer group, myself included. Each time that I have worked with Christine, it truly felt like a partnership. Never a zero sum game.
